import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import TextareaAutosize from "react-textarea-autosize"; import axios from "axios"; import Tags from "./tags"; import {CheckIcon, PlusIcon, XMarkIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const StageElem = () => { const [type,setType]=useState([]) const [tags,setTags]=useState([]) const [nameTag, setNameTag]=useState("") const [name, setName]=useState("") const [desc, setDesc]=useState("") const [city, setCity]=useState("") const [place, setPlace]=useState("") const [dateStage, setDateStage]=useState("") const [photo, setPhoto]=useState("") const [msg, setMsg]=useState("") const [dataTags,setDataTags]=useState([]) const [button, setButton]=useState(false) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/type/').then((res)=>setType(res.data)) }, []); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/tags/').then((res)=>setTags(res.data)) }, [button]); const onFileChange = (event) => { setPhoto(event.target.files[0]) } const uploadFileData = (event) => { setMsg("") const data = new FormData(); data.append('file', photo); axios.post('http://localhost:8000/img/upload', data).then((res) => { setMsg("Фото загружено") setPhoto(res.data.filename.filename) } ) } const onSelect=(event)=>{ setDataTags([...dataTags,{ tag_id:event.target.value, tag_name:event.nativeEvent.target[event.target.selectedIndex].text }]) setTags(tags.filter((elem)=>elem.tag_name !== event.nativeEvent.target[event.target.selectedIndex].text)) } return (
setName(event.target.value)} value={name}>
{photo !== "" ? : null}

{msg}

{dataTags.map(item => )} {dataTags.length < 3 ? : null}
Описание этапа
setDesc(event.target.value)} value={desc}>
Город
setCity(event.target.value)} value={city} />
Место проведения
setPlace(event.target.value)} value={place}/>
Дата проведения
setDateStage(event.target.value)} value={dateStage}/>
Тип этапа
Партнеры
Alphard Group
Alphard Group
Alphard Group
{!button ? :
setNameTag(event.target.value)} className=" outline-0 p-3 bg-white w-[162px] h-[40px] rounded-[14px] inline-flex justify-center items-center" value={nameTag}/>
}

Добавить партнера

); }; export default StageElem;
